mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders o LEFT JOIN delivery d ON o.order_unum = d.order_unum WHERE d.delivery_status < 2 <!-- 배송 시작 전일 때만 주문취소 가능 --> AND o.user_unum = #{userUnum} ORDER BY o.order_regdate DESC, o.order_unum DESC

SELECT * FROM orders o LEFT JOIN delivery d ON o.order_unum = d.order_unum WHERE d.delivery_status = 3 <!-- 배송 완료일 때만 주문취소 가능 --> AND (sysdate - d.delivery_enddate) <= 7 AND o.user_unum = #{userUnum} ORDER BY o.order_regdate DESC, o.order_unum DESC
